user.description: Choose connection type for your Quatt heatpump.

local.description: Set up local connection to your Quatt heatpump.

remote.description: Set up remote connection to your Quatt heatpump via the mobile API. Enter your CIC ID (e.g., CIC-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx).

pair.title: Pair with your Quatt device
pair.description:
Please enter your name and press the button on your CIC device ({cic}).

![Pairing button location](/local/quatt/pair.png)

You have 60 seconds to complete the pairing.

Press 'Submit' to start the pairing process and wait for confirmation.

error.invalid_cic: Invalid CIC format. Must start with 'CIC-'
error.pairing_timeout: Pairing timeout. Please try again and press the button on the CIC device within 60 seconds.

data_description.scan_interval: Number of seconds between requesting information from the Quatt.
data_description.power_sensor: External energy sensor that measures the current energy consumption of the Quatt.
